oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prairie Provinces Historical Postcards - Metadata Records
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: University of Alberta Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This set contains records for 13,472 digitized historical postcards depicting various aspects of life on the Canadian Prairies from the 1890s through the 1950s. Format: MODS XML
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: postcards
